page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES, THATCHAM.
page.content: We went to Francis Baily Primary School (5-11 yrs) and The Kennet Secondary School (11-16 yrs) to find which games children played at breaktimes. We talked to children from 5-16 yrs old and found they played Football, Skipping ,Kingy, Triangle, Flying Hats, Off ground he and Gymnastics.We discovered that Football is the most popular game for all ages. Football is a game for two teams of eleven players.The idea is to kick the ball into the opposing team's goal and is played on grass usually during the winter months.The most popular game with the Infants was Flying Hats,where you have a big square and lots of little squares with numbers in them. Children have to jump into the squares and they get the points they land on. Most children of all ages seem to play games at playtimes.
